original_text: And count the patience of our Lord as salvation, just as our beloved brother Paul also wrote to you according to the wisdom given him,
korean_text: 또 우리 주의 오래 참으심이 구원이 될 줄로 여기라 우리가 사랑하는 형제 바울도 그 받은 지혜대로 너희에게 이같이 썼고

sentences.original_text: And count the patience of our Lord as salvation
just as our beloved brother Paul also wrote to you
sentences.korean_translation: 사랑하는 우리 형제 바울이 너희에게 쓴 것과 같이

sentences.original_text: according to the wisdom given him
